title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Access
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to access real-time health metrics from my clients so that I can monitor their health status and respond to any emergencies promptly.

title: Video Communication Integration
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to facilitate video calls with my clients so that I can enhance communication regarding their health and well-being.

title: Medication Reminder System
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to set and adjust medication reminders for my clients so that they can receive timely notifications for their medications.

title: User-Friendly Interface for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want an intuitive interface to quickly access critical health information and perform necessary actions so that I can efficiently manage my clients' care without unnecessary complexity.

title: Privacy Settings Management
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to ensure that I can only access the health data of my clients that they have permitted, so that I respect their privacy and maintain trust in our relationship.

title: Incident Alert System
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to be notified of significant health incidents or anomalies in my clients' health data so that I can respond quickly and ensure their safety and well-being.
